content:
H20ooohh! Indoor Water Splash Package

  • 4-hour Waterpark Pass
  • Pizza Party & Beverages
  • Ice Cream Cake
  • Party area decorated with balloons
  • Reserved Seating in the Water Park
  • Guest Appearance from Splash
  • Custom Online Printable Invitations
  • Complimentary Water Park Pass for the Birthday Person and two adult observers

Total Package Price (based on a 10 person minimum) $399.99
Each additional swimmer is $39.99

Observer is $25.99 per person
Arcade Pass $15.00 value $10 each 10 pass purchase minimum
